name: Are you the Memori Master ? - an app to train your short term memory in a fun & interesting way
name_original: Are you the Memori Master ? - an app to train your short term memory in a fun & interesting way
description:
Find your own method to memorise all the positions of graphics and get bonus 100 points on every level!


Instruction
1. Some graphics out of 20 will be shown, memorise the positions within 2 seconds
2. Tap on the circles shown graphics and submit your decision
3. Your score on this level will be shown and accumulated to next level

Score Calculation
Wrong -1
Correct +1
ALL Correct on top +100 Bonus
Give up -100
ALL wrong on top -100

4. Level up and more graphics need to be memorised
5. Your best score will be sent to Game Centre and ranked comparing with other players

Don’t try to do something silly like flipping all the circles and get scores on every level. We’ve predicted you will do this. :P To be meaningful and challenging, some rules are set above to calculate your score.

By getting bonus 100 points, it’s not difficult to get thousand scores. I’ve got 4 thousands temporarily. How many thousands can you get? I will challenge you if you get a higher score than me.


Features
Cyber-like sound effect
Clean, simple but colourful user interface
Send score to Game Centre
Train & test your short-term memory
Suitable for all age groups
